def main():
  n = int(input())
  x = list(map(int, input().split()))
  v = list(map(int, input().split()))
  x = list(zip(x, v))
  x.sort()
  x = list(zip(*x))
  x = list(map(list, x))
  x[0].sort()
  x[1].sort()
  res = 0
  i = 0
  while i < n - 1:
    if x[1][i] == x[1][i + 1]:
      res += abs(x[0][i] - x[0][i + 1])
    i += 1
  print(res)

if __name__ == "__main__":
  main()

import sys

def main():
    n = int(input())
    x = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    v = [int(i) for i in input().split()]
    t = [x[i]/v[i] for i in range(n)]
    t_sorted = sorted(t)
    s = 0
    for i in range(n):
        for j in range(i+1, n):
            s += abs(t_sorted[i] - t_sorted[j])
    print(s)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

# Python 2

n = int(raw_input())
xs = map(int, raw_input().split())
vs = map(int, raw_input().split())

min_dist = 0
for i in range(n):
    for j in range(i + 1, n):
        min_dist += min(abs(xs[i] - xs[j]), abs(xs[i] - xs[j] - vs[j] + vs[i]), abs(xs[i] - xs[j] + vs[j] - vs[i]))

print min_dist

n = int(input())
x = list(map(int, input().split()))
v = list(map(int, input().split()))

x.sort()

from itertools import combinations

result = 0

for i, j in combinations(range(n), 2):
    if v[i] > v[j]:
        result += x[j] - x[i]
    else:
        result += x[i] - x[j]

print(result)
